name: Raptor's Revenge
description:
Our little game about a raptor saving her brethren eggs. 

Controls: 

Space: Leap

W: Grappling hook

Arrow keys/A,D: Movement

ESC: Menu

Credits:  

Manager/additional art: Wilma Schwenk

Programmer: Valdemar Petterson
